name: Spectrier
flavorText: It probes its surroundings with all its senses save one—it doesn't use its sense of sight. Spectrier's kicks are said to separate soul from body.

attacks.name: Night Footsteps
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon and put 2 damage counters on each of them.

attacks.name: Phantom Strike
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Phantom Strike.
